name: Crowned Eagle
description: A sharp-eyed eagle whose noble crown further enhances its regal bearing.\nThe crowned eagle excels at circling high above its prey. Due to its strong build and wide wingspan, its dive attacks are particularly lethal. In The Realm Within, where food is plentiful, it rarely hunts. However, it still frequently circles high in the skies to show off its beautiful crest...\nFor some unknown reason, even after coming to The Realm Within, certain creatures have retained the unique appearances that were previously formed under the influence of kuuvahki...
